command:
swift build -c debug
mkdir -p ${workspaceFolder}/Products
cp -rf ${workspaceFolder}/.build/debug/Run ${workspaceFolder}/Products
cp -rf ${workspaceFolder}/Public ${workspaceFolder}/Products
cp -rf ${workspaceFolder}/Resources ${workspaceFolder}/Products
nautilus ${workspaceFolder}/Products

swift build -c release
mkdir -p ${workspaceFolder}/Products
cp -rf ${workspaceFolder}/.build/release/Run ${workspaceFolder}/Products
cp -rf ${workspaceFolder}/Public ${workspaceFolder}/Products
cp -rf ${workspaceFolder}/Resources ${workspaceFolder}/Products
open ${workspaceFolder}/Products
